attributes.additional_details: This shop needs to be closed down or taken over in the hands of someone else happy to run it for them show them how it’s done rather than conning people they need to be shut both the post office and shop and I’ve had many complaints about them
attributes.background: This shop is always conning people selling to underage children putting money on top of rrp etc

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

In any case, we can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level. 

We can also only accept petitions from people who provide their full name.
